subject: World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: The American Ted Ligety dominated his rivals to clinch a second consecutive World Cup giant slalom Saturday, beating Aksel Lund Svindal of Norway by more than a second.
snippet: The American Ted Ligety dominated his rivals to clinch a second consecutive World Cup giant slalom Saturday, beating Aksel Lund Svindal of Norway by more than a second.
